resemble.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to look like or be similar to someone or something
resemble.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Itâ€™s amazing how closely Brian and Steve resemble each other.

resemble.translation[0].note_box[0].sect: This poem closely resembles an earlier one.
The ancient tools discovered in Ethiopia strongly resemble those found in Tanzania.
I heard a weird sound vaguely resembling the bark of a dog.
Nothing remotely resembling a cure has been found.
resemble nothing so much as something
The building resembled nothing so much as giant beehive.
